markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Orthographic Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=2002) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 179 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Loremaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=65)

**Prerequisites**
[Loremaster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2000)

</column>

---

You understand the principles that underlie all written words, allowing you to read nearly any text. You can attempt to [Decipher Writing](/Actions.aspx?ID=22) using [Loremaster Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) in place of the required skill.
name: Orthographic Mastery
